mapper.select:
select t.rwmc, t.rwms, t1.mxmc, to_char(t.zxsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS') zxsj, t.mxid, t.rwid, t5.ztmc yxzt from znsjcl_jh_xtdr t left join znsjcl_dm_yxzt t5 on t.yxzt = t5.ztid, znsjcl_yj_zdymx t1 where t.mxid = t1.mxid and t.yxbz = 'Y'
and t.rwmc like '%${svo.rwmc}%'
order by t.zxsj desc
select t.mxid id, t.mxmc text from znsjcl_yj_zdymx t where t.yxbz = 'Y'
select distinct t.zqid id,t.zqmc text from znsjcl_dm_zxzq t
mapper.update: UPDATE znsjcl_jh_xtdr set yxbz = 'N' WHERE rwid='${svo.rwid}'
mapper.insert: insert into znsjcl_jh_xtdr (rwid, rwmc, rwms, mxid, zxsj, ztid, yxbz,yxzt) values (zdymx_mxid.nextval, '${svo.rwmc}', '${svo.rwms}', '${svo.mxid}', sysdate, '${svo.ztid}', 'Y','3' )
mapper.update: UPDATE znsjcl_jh_xtdr set yxbz='N' WHERE rwid='${svo.rwid}'
mapper.select: select t.rwmc from znsjcl_jh_xtdr t where t.rwmc='${svo.rwmc}' and t.yxbz='Y'
